mapper.select: SELECT vs.created_by, vn.node_id FROM vika_space vs JOIN vika_node vn ON vs.space_id = vn.space_id AND vn.type = 0 AND vn.is_rubbish = 0 WHERE vs.is_deleted = 0

SELECT vnp.node_id, vum.user_id AS createdBy FROM vika_node_permission vnp JOIN vika_unit vu ON vnp.unit_id = vu.id AND vu.unit_type = 3 JOIN vika_unit_member vum ON vu.unit_ref_id = vum.id WHERE vnp.role_code = 'owner';
SELECT space_id, node_id, MIN(created_at) AS createdAt FROM vika_node_permission GROUP BY node_id ORDER BY MIN(created_at);

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) FROM vika_control_role vcr WHERE created_by IS NULL
SELECT vnp.id, vnp.role_code, vnp.updated_at FROM vika_node_permission vnp JOIN vika_control_role vcr ON vnp.id = vcr.id WHERE vnp.role_code != vcr.role_code AND vnp.updated_at > vcr.updated_at

SELECT vcr.id FROM vika_control_role vcr JOIN vika_control vc ON vcr.control_id = vc.control_id AND vc.control_type = 0 WHERE vcr.id <= #{maxId} AND vcr.id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM vika_node_permission)
SELECT control_id FROM vika_control WHERE control_type = 0
SELECT vn.space_id, vn.node_id, MIN(vcr.created_at) AS createdAt FROM vika_control_role vcr JOIN vika_node vn ON vcr.control_id = vn.node_id GROUP BY vcr.control_id ORDER BY MIN(vcr.created_at);
